name: K4CommunitySmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the bedroom light”
”Alexa, turn off all lights”
”Alexa, make the living room warmer”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
K4Community brings the future of senior living technology to residents, family and team members, enabling smarter communities, enhanced wellness, and empowered engagement and socialization.

This skill works in conjunction with the home automation devices like bulbs, dimmers, thermostats to be controlled using voice. With voice as your power to control the IOT devices, you will not need to open the K4Community app every time to switch the light on. Its as simple as saying "Alexa, turn on the bedroom light"
